description:
When you watch the video above, you can see my qualifications with the Russian Tortoise and parts of each section of this course that will result in you knowing more about these tortoises than 95% of all current owners!

What you'll enjoy about this course is how easy it is to follow along with and it contains just the important information you need to have a healthy, long-lived Russian tortoise, not detail designed for advanced tortoise keepers.

It's a 100% video course with a couple of PDF documents at the end for building your own indoor pen just like mine, the core diet items, and links to other valuable websites and Russian tortoise resources.

The course has an hours worth of material, which is all you need, to have a strong understanding of the unique needs of this fascinating tortoise.

The course is structured based on my four levels of tortoise husbandry that starts with understanding where they come from and how it determines the type of pen they need and the diet and food items they need to thrive.

As you watch the 20 video lessons, you'll understand where they come from and why having their pen simulate their native environment is critical to their survival - what they eat in the wild and how it's simple and inexpensive to replicate - wherever you live.

And you'll be happy to learn that 30-40% of your Russian tortoises diet can be found in your backyard or vacant lot!

This course gives those people who own or are thinking of buying one these these amazing animals everything I've been doing for my Russian group for 16 years (and the accumulated wisdom of 45 years with tortoise species like the Russian) to ensure your Russian tortoise lives a long, healthy, active life.
title: How To Successfully Choose and Care For a Russian Tortoise
